question: Roy Dotrice, the veteran actor passed away. He hailed from which country?
explanation: Roy Dotrice (94), a veteran British actor, has passed away in London, England on October 16, 2017. He was best known for his Tony Award-winning Broadway performance in the revival of \'A Moon for the Misbegotten\'. He also narrated the first five books in George R. R. Martin\'s fantasy series \'A Song of Ice and Fire\'.
